00001 //This can be used to load PCX files into BSurfaces!
00002 
00003 #ifndef PCX_H
00004 #define PCX_H
00005 
00006 #include <Surface.h>
00007 
00008 class PCX
00009 {
00010 public:
00011         //Load a PCX file
00012         static bool LoadFile(const char* pFileName)
00013         {
00014                 PUSH_IMM(0);
00015                 PUSH_IMM(2);
00016                 PUSH_VAR32(pFileName);
00017                 THISCALL_EX(0xAC4848, 0x6B9D00);
00018         }
00019         
00020         //Get a BSurface for a PCX file. File needs to be loaded some time first!
00021         static BSurface* GetSurface(const char* pFileName)
00022         {
00023                 PUSH_IMM(0);
00024                 PUSH_VAR32(pFileName);
00025                 THISCALL_EX(0xAC4848, 0x6BA140);
00026         }
00027 };
00028 
00029 #endif
